name: A guy killing random slimes in a dungeon
name_original: A guy killing random slimes in a dungeon
description:
Click to move anywhere within your movement range

If there are enemies within range, you will be given the option to attack. Click to attack

After you attack, the enemies will move and attack

Your move, damage and range are randomly assigned at the beginning of every turn

Your goal is to reach the exit

I made this game for the 7DRL challenge

The enemies have very different stats, it is up to you to work them out
